## Setup 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

## Read in data

```{r}
raw <- read_csv("data-raw/babynames_2000_2024_NICAR26.csv")
```

## Cleaning

```{r}
babynames <- raw |> clean_names()
```

```{r}
babynames |> head(10)
```

```{r}
babynames |> tail(7)
```


## Analysis 

### Group By and Summarize

```{r}
babynames |> group_by(yr) 
```

Count

```{r}
babynames |> group_by(yr) |> summarize(total_names = n())
```

```{r}
babynames |> group_by(yr, sex) |> summarize(total_names = n())
```

```{r}
babynames |> group_by(yr, sex) |> summarize(total_names = n()) |> pivot_wider(names_from = sex, values_from = total_names)
```


```{r}
babynames |> tabyl(yr, sex)
```

Sum

```{r}
babynames |> group_by(yr) |> summarize(total_babies = sum(name_count))
```
